deliveryMilestones.title: New Exchange Listings - Completed
deliveryMilestones.Content: Joystream was listed on the Gate.io and BitMart exchanges, bringing the total number of exchanges listing the token to 4. More listings are planned in future quarters.

deliveryMilestones.title: Content Infrastructure: Visibility - Completed
deliveryMilestones.Content: With greater utilization and scale, it has become clear that there is a need for better visibility into errors and performance levels at different layers of the infrastructure. This means both capturing data from the consumer and infrastructure layer, and also synthetically probing infrastructure to detect problems as early as possible. Currently, there is quite poor visibility into the performance of infrastructure, and the experience of users in interacting with this infrastructure. The goal of this milestone is to ship a set of integrations and standards for core infrastructure nodes, like Argus, Orion, to facilitate such visibility.

deliveryMilestones.title: Stablecoin Treasury - Completed
deliveryMilestones.Content: A stablecoin treasury was developed and is now controlled by long-term trusted community members

deliveryMilestones.title: Mobile design for Pioneer - Completed
deliveryMilestones.Content: Pioneer’s design was updated to have a Responsive Web Design (RWD) enabling it to be used on smartphones and tablets.

deliveryMilestones.title: Pioneer Email Notifications - Completed
deliveryMilestones.Content: Email notifications for on-chain events, like election stages or forum mentions can greatly enhance user interactivity with Pioneer and Joystream in general.

deliveryMilestones.title: Content Delivery Improvements - V1 - Completed
deliveryMilestones.Content: The first in a series of improvements aimed at increasing the speed and reliability of content delivery to users. This will also include tooling to measure the speed of the current content delivery network (CDN) infrastructure so that it can be further improved upon in later iterations.

deliveryMilestones.title: Gleev Recommended Content - V1 - Completed
deliveryMilestones.Content: Improving the landing page experience for Gleev users so that more varied and higher quality content is given preference.

deliveryMilestones.title: New Wallets - Completed
deliveryMilestones.Content: Joystream was added to the OneKey hardware wallet, Polkadot Vault as well as Novawallet & NovaSpektr. More wallet integrations are still planned for the future (Tangem, Ledger)

deliveryMilestones.title: Ethereum Bridge
deliveryMilestones.Content: Development & deployment of a bridging solution on Joystream that will allow for interoperability with Ethereum. In this first version, the goal would be to make JOY accessible on the Ethereum mainnet as an ERC20 token, from which it could be bridged further to other L2s and side-chains. This would allow JOY to be traded, custodied and used with a much wider set of tools.

deliveryMilestones.title: Creator Ambassador Program
deliveryMilestones.Content: The creation and management of the Ambassador program will empower influencers to leverage their platforms, amplifying awareness about the Joystream protocol, and driving engagement and adoption

deliveryMilestones.title: Creator Tokens
deliveryMilestones.Content: Creator tokens is a key financial, value capture and community growth primitive unlocked by Joystream. It allows creator to issue a fungible token which captures revenue generated by their channel, and distributes a share of it pro-rate to token holders. There are also complementary features around bootstrapping liquidity, raising funds through a public sale, and also managing access and vesting. This functionality has already been implemented in the blockchain and indexing infrastructure, and very mature designs have already been designed, what remains is to ship a fully working experience which productizes this.

deliveryMilestones.title: Project Overview Dashboard
deliveryMilestones.Content: A purpose built data-driven dashboard to explain the project’s current status, growth and market positioning. This will be on the main project website and make it easy & quick for people to understand how the platform is going.

deliveryMilestones.title: Staking module for Pioneer
deliveryMilestones.Content: A user friendly dashboard for staking and nominating that will make it far easier to identify verified validators to stake tokens towards for rewards.

deliveryMilestones.title: Content Search V2
deliveryMilestones.Content: Searching across videos and channels, and also doing search within channels or content categories, is important for effective discovery. Currently, Orion has very rudimentary full text natural language matching on titles and descriptions, but it is very brittle and naive, and often misses the mark. The goal of this milestone is to ship proper modern search capabilities.

deliveryMilestones.title: Content Recommendations V2
deliveryMilestones.Content: Surfacing personalized content for a consumer is a key requirement for any content platform. Key product experiences like home screens, feeds and related content, all depend on having modern Machine learning based content recommendation system. Currently Orion has no infrastructure to produce or serve such recommendations, and app recommendations are being done entirely client-side. The goal of this milestone is to ship the first recommendation capability in Orion, to make Joystream apps much more

deliveryMilestones.title: Content Infrastructure: Performance
deliveryMilestones.Content: Having very low latency of content delivery is a critical requirement for any social content product that involves users navigating across lots of different content over time. This depends on having well configured nodes with appropriate technical specifications, and most importantly - properly architecture node software. With the benefit of prior work on visibility we will have a solid foundation for ensuring that we can reach industry benchmarks for video content delivery, and that is the goal of this milestone.

deliveryMilestones.title: Fiat On/Off Ramp
deliveryMilestones.Content: Getting started with Joystream in one of our consumer apps is super easy, as you are floated a small initial balance of tokens you can only use for transaction fees. However, there are plenty of features which do require more substantial quantities of tokens, such as buying NFTs or Creator Tokens, and conversely, as a creator you are likely eager to not only have the native token, but to cash out to Fiat. For both of these reasons we are working on introducing a proper in-app on/off ramp for consumers and creators of an Atlas app. There are many great ramp partners, such as Transak, which have robust low-friction buy/sell widgets for crypto using credit cards, Apple/Google pay, from across a large number of jurisdictions.

deliveryMilestones.title: Pioneer Financials Page - V1
deliveryMilestones.Content: A new module for Pioneer that will show the current financials of the DAO, which will show data for spending and accounting for the council and all working groups.

deliveryMilestones.title: Content Curator Tooling
deliveryMilestones.Content: Improved tooling for our Content Curator Working Group that will allow for them to better handle the large amount of uploads they manage each day.

deliveryMilestones.title: Automated Thumbnail Generation
deliveryMilestones.Content: Automatic creation of thumbnails when users upload videos to Gleev or Atlas enabling a more seamless upload experience for content creators.

deliveryMilestones.title: Pioneer Forum & Proposal label system
deliveryMilestones.Content: A labeling system that will help to link together the hundreds of proposals and forum threads that our governance system has already generated. This will make navigation and sharing information significantly improved.

deliveryMilestones.title: Governance Tooling
deliveryMilestones.Content: Tooling and the creation of scripts to enable our elected Council Members and Working Groups be capable of generating budget and other reports more easily.

deliveryMilestones.title: Joystream CLI Improvements
deliveryMilestones.Content: Various quality of life improvements to our command-line interface (CLI) tool that will allow for work on the DAO to be completed more easily.

deliveryMilestones.title: Bounties Program
deliveryMilestones.Content: Creation and management of bounties encompassing a variety of interest areas such as marketing, development, research and range in scope and are a great way to get new users involved with the project.

deliveryMilestones.title: New Exchange Listings
deliveryMilestones.Content: Outreach & discussions with additional cryptocurrency exchanges to provide users with more options for trading the JOY token.

deliveryMilestones.title: Content Infrastructure: Authentication & Authorization
deliveryMilestones.Content: Proper monetization, both for the DAO and individual creators, depends on being able to practically restrict access to content, or make access conditional. Currently, the infrastructure has no awareness of who the consumer is, or the semantics around what the content is, or any associated authorization policy. The goal of this milestone is to introduce basic authentication and authorization at the content layer, enforced by content delivery nodes. This will allow features such as gating videos to only NFT holders for example.

deliveryMilestones.title: dApp Operator/Developer Grants & Support
deliveryMilestones.Content: Development of a grants program to attract dApp operators and developers to build on the Joystream platform and build our ecosystem.

deliveryMilestones.title: Non-video Content Uploads
deliveryMilestones.Content: Improvements to the current content upload system which will enable users to upload more formats such as audio, podcasts and image files.

deliveryMilestones.title: Premium Video Comments & Tips
deliveryMilestones.Content: Add functionality for users to leave comments on videos with a tip attached to them that will be sent to the channel owner. This will also enable functionality for users to tip channels and videos directly.

deliveryMilestones.title: DAO Creator Channel Payout tooling improvements
deliveryMilestones.Content: Improvements to the tooling for our Channel Payout Proposal feature which will allow for the DAO to coordinate rewards to channel owners more regularly and at a larger scale.

deliveryMilestones.title: Pioneer Working Group Management Module
deliveryMilestones.Content: Adds functionality to Pioneer which allow for our working groups to create and manage job openings, hire and fire workers as well as adjust worker salaries more easily. This will reduce the technical knowledge required to use the DAO and increase the appeal of Joystream in areas such as marketing and outreach.

deliveryMilestones.title: New Exchange Listings
deliveryMilestones.Content: Outreach & discussions with additional cryptocurrency exchanges to provide users with more options for trading the JOY token.

deliveryMilestones.title: Video Communities
deliveryMilestones.Content: Launching a new application for your community using Atlas currently requires a lot of deep technical knowledge. You have to obtain hosting and a domain, start the service, configure it, and then maintain it. This is quite difficult. The goal of this milestone is to create the Reddit to phpBB, in terms of the experience of a prospective community creator and moderator. One requires substantially more work and skill. By instead offering a fully hosted and simple point-and-click feature, we can make it orders of magnitude easier to allow third parties to invite their communities to use Joystream.

deliveryMilestones.title: Playlists
deliveryMilestones.Content: A key primitive for organizing content is through playlists. We have developed designs and metadata formats for this a long time ago, but in this milestone we will finally ship the ability for publishing and consuming playlists.

deliveryMilestones.title: Bounties Module
deliveryMilestones.Content: Development & deployment of an on-chain bounty management module that will enable bounties to be posted and crowdfunded by users including oracle selection and reward splitting. The council will also have the unique feature of being able to fund bounties that it selects for being of benefit to the platform via the council treasury.

deliveryMilestones.title: Smartphone App for Atlas/Gleev
deliveryMilestones.Content: Development of a progressive web app for Atlas/Gleev that will allow for the app to be installed on user’s smartphones without having to go through app stores.

deliveryMilestones.title: NFT Improvements - V1
deliveryMilestones.Content: The first in a series of improvements for our NFT functionality which will include the ability to make offers for unlisted NFTs, hide and unhide NFTs, “add NFTs to cart” as well as send NFTs to other users directly.

deliveryMilestones.title: Staking Nomination Pools
deliveryMilestones.Content: Implementation of on-chain nomination pools which will allow for users to far more easily and quickly stake the JOY token for pooled rewards from other users. This will also provide an important revenue stream for wallet developers and make the Joystream project more attractive to be featured on wallets.

deliveryMilestones.title: New Exchange Listings
deliveryMilestones.Content: Outreach & discussions with additional cryptocurrency exchanges to provide users with more options for trading the JOY token.

deliveryMilestones.title: Joystream SDK
deliveryMilestones.Content: Building on top of Joystream today is still a challenging experience. There are no robust libraries or builder documentation for application development. Offering an excellent experience for developer to build apps, and not just use Atlas off-the shelf, will require a significant investment in building out the SDK. This milestone has as a goal to extract the core of key existing applications, like Atlas and Pioneer, and then to synthesize it all into a new core developer experience, with a suite of excellent tutorials, documentation, examples and also active outreach.

deliveryMilestones.title: Transcoding & Adaptive Streaming
deliveryMilestones.Content: Users access content across a wide range of browser, devices, applications and also under heterogeneous and dynamic bandwidth constraints. As it stands, only a single version of each media asset is represented in our metadata standards and backend node software. This means have now way to represent a broad range of encodings and resolutions for media assets, let alone produce all of these. Introducing server-side transcoding in Orion will unlock this, and many other future benefits that come from server-side post-processing (thumbnail extractions, auto-subtitling, etc.). It will also unlock the ability to do adaptive streaming, where a user with a dynamic connection can more quickly see asset resolve and play, and also be able to watch videos under suboptimal circumstances.

deliveryMilestones.title: Premium Content Gating Features
deliveryMilestones.Content: This feature will allow for content creators to restrict access for content to users unless they pay a fee, enabling another revenue stream for premium content.

deliveryMilestones.title: Multiple Video Resolutions
deliveryMilestones.Content: Support for multiple video resolutions on content that will provide a more seamless playback experience on a variety of devices.

deliveryMilestones.title: Metamask Snap Development
deliveryMilestones.Content: The development of a “Metamask Snap” plugin that will enable Joystream assets to be usable by Metamask users.
